mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM good WHERE sku_id=#{skuId} AND datetime=#{datetime}
mapper.update: UPDATE good SET product_name=#{productName}, seller_sku=#{sellerSku}, url=#{url}, sku_visitors=#{skuVisitors}, sku_pageviews=#{skuPageviews}, visitor_value=#{visitorValue}, buyers=#{buyers}, orders=#{orders}, units_sold=#{unitsSold}, revenue=#{revenue}, conversion_rate=#{conversionRate}, revenue_per_buyer=#{revenuePerBuyer}, wishlist_visitor=#{wishlistVisitor}, wishlists=#{wishlists}, add_to_car_visitors=#{addToCarVisitors}, add_to_car_units=#{addToCarUnits}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE sku_id=#{skuId} AND datetime=#{datetime}

update good
